content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li

content: Hello Baihu Li, thank you for coming to see the apartment. Based on the information you provided, I propose a rental price of 500 Euros per month. This price is competitive in the area and takes into account the size of the apartment. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Baihu Li

content: This price is too high, I can find a similar apartment for 450-480 Euros per month. Would you be willing to negotiate?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Certainly, I am open to negotiating. Based on your suggestion, I am willing to consider a rental price of 475 Euros per month. This price takes into account the market value of similar apartments in the area and the size of the apartment. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Baihu Li

content:
This price is still too high, I can find a similar apartment for 450 Euros per month. Would you be willing to lower the price to 450 Euros or 460 Euros?

Also, can I have a contract with a one-month notice period? As I am a student and may need to move out of the apartment in a short period of time.

Lastly, is there any additional fee or deposit that I need to pay when I sign the contract?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your concerns and am willing to negotiate further. Based on your suggestion, I am willing to consider a rental price of 450 Euros per month. As for the contract, I can include a one-month notice period. However, please note that the notice period will begin on the day the tenant moves out of the apartment, not the day the notice is given.

Regarding additional fees or deposits, there will be a security deposit of one month's rent due upon signing the contract. This deposit will be returned to the tenant at the end of the lease term, provided the tenant has fulfilled their obligations under the contract.

Is this revised offer acceptable to you?
name: Baihu Li
